snippet.title: Official Waking Mars Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Waking Mars by Tiger Style

Uncover the Mysteries of Ancient Mars

Homepage:

http://www.wakingmars.com 

Follow us @tigerstylegames

Like us on Facebook:  http://on.fb.me/PlPktN

Story:

In 2097, life is discovered on Mars. When your mission of first contact becomes trapped by a cave-in, you must master the alien ecosystem to survive.

Soon you stumble upon more than anyone expected, and with time running out, you will make a decision that determines the fate of a lost planet.

Waking Mars is a one-of-a-kind adventure in which you jetpack through subterranean Mars encountering a host of extraordinary alien lifeforms that operate as a living, breathing ecosystem.

Learn and master the behaviors of these creatures to create ecosystems of your own design if you are to survive and discover the secrets of Mars' past.

Features:

- Expressive, creative gameplay.  Cultivate an ecosystem of your own design.
- Intuitive touch-screen controls.  Touch to jetpack, tap to throw.
- Interact with over a dozen unique lifeforms as you revive the
Martian ecosystem.
- Over six hours of single-player adventure with multiple endings.
- Explore the natural beauty of a vast, open-ended network of caves on Mars.
- Game Center Achievements and Leaderboards.
- Tweet your research progress back to your friends on Earth!

Coming soon to an Galaxy close to your iTunes Store at March 01.2012

iTunes Store Page:

http://itunes.com/apps/wakingmars
